title: Radroach

==Useful Info==
'''Radroaches''' are dangerous denizens of the [[Spider's Nest]]. Their [[Irradiate]] spell, similar to the player, inflicts heavy [[magical contamination]] and damage to any foe that enters melee range.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*While radroaches are fairly bulky, softening it up with any sort of ranged attack is always preferable. They are weak to [[silver]], and [[curare]] can let you [[kite]] them for a bit.
*Radroaches are generally unwilling to Irradiate its own allies. It'll blast through trivial enemies like regular [[worm]]s, but even a single [[redback]] adjacent ''to the radroach'' will heavily discourage the spell from being used.
*A [[potion of cancellation]] will remove contamination.

==History==
*Radroaches were added in [[0.28]]
